description:
NEC Corporation has established itself as a leader in the integration of IT and network technologies while promoting the brand statement of “Orchestrating a brighter world.” NEC enables businesses and communities to adapt to rapid changes taking place in both society and the market as it provides for the social values of safety, security, fairness and efficiency to promote a more sustainable world where everyone has the chance to reach their full potential. For more information, visit NEC at http://www.nec.com

NEC's Strengths and Competencies
・Named "2017 Global 100 Most Sustainable Corporations in the World"​  an Index Listing the World’s 100 Most Sustainable Corporations
・Named one of the "World's Top 100 Most Innovative Organizations for 2016"​ by Thomson Reuters 
・Face recognition technology achieved No. 1 in the recent Face in Video Evaluation (FIVE, *1) testing performed by the U.S. National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) (*2)

(*1) https://www.nist.gov/programs-projects/face-video-evaluation-five
(*2) Results shown from the Face In Video Evaluation (FIVE), the Multiple Biometric Grand Challenge (MBGC), the Multiple Biometric Evaluation (MBE) and the Face Recognition Vendor Test (FRVT) do not constitute endorsement of any particular product by the U.S. Government.

** Please note that we reserve the right to delete any comments posted on NEC Corporation’s LinkedIn page that are deemed extremely defamatory or libelous to any company or individual, or that may be offensive to others.
name: NEC Corporation

NEC Corporation of Malaysia Sdn Bhd

updates.text:
I recently had the pleasure of hosting Young Sang Ryu, President & CEO of SK Telecom, the largest mobile operator in Korea, at NEC headquarters.  
 
Both NEC and SK Telecom share roots in the telecommunications industry and we are each now forming partnerships with global companies while applying AI to key business areas. 
 
I truly appreciate the opportunity to meet with everyone from the SK Telecom delegation, to strengthen our relationships and to explore new ways for creating value for society.  
 
#NEC #NECGlobal #SKTelecom

I would like to thank Bastian Nominacher, Co-Founder and Co-CEO of Celonis, for taking the time to visit NEC headquarters recently and for your continued support. It was a pleasure discussing how our partnership is driving the growth of digital transformation (DX) and I am excited about how our collaboration can enable the development of tailored solutions that optimize business processes and unlock new efficiencies.

I look forward to continuing this journey of innovation and growth together.

#NEC #NECglobal #Celonis #DX

NEC is driving digital transformation through its Mid-term Management Plan, positioning itself as "Client Zero" for advanced corporate evolution. Biometric authentication and digital IDs transform workstyles to boost productivity and collaboration, and standardized processes and accessible dashboards empower data-driven decisions at all levels. Partnering with innovators, NEC delivers seamless AI integration to foster a culture of rapid transformation. We aim to create social value and share insights through global co-creation.

#NEC #NECglobal #ClientZero #DigitalTransformation #Innovation #AI #Productivity #CorporateEvolution #SocialValue

I have arrived in Baku, Azerbaijan to participate in the 29th Conference of the Parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (#COP29).
 
At this COP29, the Adaptation Finance Consortium jointly established by NEC and Mitsui Sumitomo Insurance (三井住友海上火災保険株式会社) is exhibiting a pavilion. We look forward to discussing with many people, aiming to realize a society resilient to climate change.

I am scheduled to speak at several seminars, some of which can be attended online. I will introduce the latest activities and achievements of 'Adaptation Finance,' which promotes investment towards reducing the impacts of climate change. If you're interested, please join us:
-> Advancing Climate Adaptation with Digital Technology: Fostering Pilots of Excellence in Climate Resilience through Partnerships (https://lnkd.in/gJXKPSiN)  Nov.15 16:30 - 17:30 (Azerbaijan Time) 
organized by: UN Climate Change
-> ICT X Green Seminar (https://lnkd.in/gxVamPtt) Nov. 16 11:45 - 13:00 (Azerbaijan Time) 
 organized by: the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications of Japan
 
#COP29 #NEC #NECglobal

Business leaders from Australia and New Zealand pay a visit to NEC. 🤝
 
Delegation from Women Leaders by the Circle organized by Trans - Tasman Business Circle, an organization comprised of Australian and New Zealand businesses, including NEC Australia, were recently invited to visit NEC where they were introduced to the company’s solutions for accelerating DX and initiatives aimed at promoting Diversity & Inclusion (D&I). 
 
In attendance from NEC were Chief Diversity Officer Yuka Shigesawa and Corporate Senior Vice President Mayuko Tatewaki, both of whom engaged in a spirited exchange of views with participants. 

#NEC #NECglobal #TTBC #DEI #InclusionandDiversity

NEC's generative AI service "NEC cotomi" was launched in 2023. 🌟
 
NEC embarked on the development of artificial intelligence (AI) technology in the 1960s. Since then, it has focused on developing the technologies comprising AI—namely, speech recognition, image and video recognition, language and semantic understanding, and machine learning. We have also engaged in the development of supercomputers, including the supercomputer "SX-1" and "SX-2" announced in 1983. 
 
Drawing on expertise gained over many years, NEC launched its NEC cotomi generative AI services boasting world-class Japanese language processing performance in August 2023. 
 
The name “cotomi” was derived from our belief that words have the power to shape the future and our desire to bring the dreams of our customers to fruition. And we are finding that we have been able to do just that as many of the customers who have already introduced these services tell us they have helped streamline their operations. 
 
NEC remains committed to contributing to its customers’ operations and business endeavors with the advanced technological capabilities it has cultivated over many years and the provision of comprehensive support ranging from introduction to operation and risk management. 
 
#NEC #NECglobal #NECs125th #Celebrating125yearsofNEC #AI #technology #NECcotomi
